channel.title: Ancients
channel.description:
How do I make it so I can cast ancient spells without Wielding an Ancient Staff?
When I use an Ancient spell without staff, I get "You need an ancient staff to cast this Spell."

item.title: Ancients

Still no errors, and didn’t work either, Oh well.

if (wearID == 4675) { // Ancient staff playerSE = 809; playerSEA = 806; playerSEW = 1146; playerSER = 1210; }
